tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Vehicle (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    vehicle_speed INT,
    direction VARCHAR(50),
    intersection_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (intersection_id) REFERENCES Intersection(intersection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Signal (
    signal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    intersection_id INT,
    signal_color VARCHAR(10),
    signal_duration INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (intersection_id) REFERENCES Intersection(intersection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_streets (
  street_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  street_name VARCHAR(255),
  traffic_flow DECIMAL,
  traffic_density DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE intersection_signals (
  signal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  intersection_name VARCHAR(255),
  signal_light_color VARCHAR(50),
  signal_duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_cameras (
  camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_location VARCHAR(255),
  camera_status VARCHAR(50),
  camera_angle DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  street_id INT,
  signal_id INT,
  camera_id INT,
  traffic_volume DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE intersection_signals (
    intersection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    signal_color VARCHAR(20),
    signal_duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_cameras (
    camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    is_active BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    intersection_id INT,
    vehicle_count INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE signal_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    intersection_id INT,
    signal_status VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_engineers (
    engineer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    engineer_name VARCHAR(50),
    engineer_specialty VARCHAR(50)
)
